bug.author: algattik
bug.description:
"then the RunConfiguration is loaded from /.azureml/ or /aml_config/." should be rewritten without leading slashes: "then the RunConfiguration is loaded from .azureml/ or aml_config/." <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>
⚠ Do not edit this section. It is required for docs.microsoft.com ➟ GitHub issue linking.
ID: 882f737f-4f00-3cc2-d9b8-410c09fdad9f Version Independent ID: ea049c24-1544-523b-c9ba-e3b805d60492 Content: azureml.core.RunConfiguration class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-core/azureml.core.RunConfiguration.yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @j-martens Microsoft Alias: jmartens

comments.comment: Thanks for pointing this out. The HTML was not rendering correctly so there was missing markup before the leading slash and after the trailing slash that would give the correct context. The correct markup is: <path>/.azureml/<name> or <path>/aml_config/<name> Rendering was addressed and will go live in next SDK release in a few weeks.
